src:
Manchester United Siapkan Proposal Rp1,4 Triliun untuk Beli Declan Rice
05 Nov 2019, 08:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Upaya Manchester United mendapatkan gelandang Declan Rice memasuki babak baru. Setan Merah dinyatakan telah menyiapkan proposal pembelian dengan nilai Rp1,4 triliun untuk gelandang West Ham tersebut.
Declan Rice sudah menjadi bidikan Manchester United sejak awal musim 2019/2020. Hanya saja, United tidak mungkin membeli pemain berusia 20 tahun karena sudah mengeluarkan uang dalam jumlah besar.
United sudah mengalokasikan dana belanja awal musim untuk membeli Daniel James [15 juta pounds], Aaron Wan-Bissaka [50 juta pounds], dan Harry Maguire [75 juta pounds]. Jadi, United harus melewatkan saga transfer Declan Rice.
Meskipun tidak membelinya di awal musim, ketertarikan United pada Declan Rice tidak pernah pundar. Setan Merah terus memantau pemain asal Inggris tersebut. United bahkan disebut telah menyiapkan rencana transfer untuk Declan Rice.
text:
Manchester United Prepares Rp1.4 Trillion Proposal to Buy Declan Rice
05 Nov 2019, 08:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United's efforts to get midfielder Declan Rice enter a new phase. The Red Devils are said to have prepared a purchase proposal with a value of Rp1.4 trillion for the West Ham midfielder.
Declan Rice has been a target of Manchester United since the start of the 2019/2020 season. However, United is not possible to buy a 20-year-old player because it has spent large amounts of money.
United have allocated early season spending to buy Daniel James [15 million pounds], Aaron Wan-Bissaka (50 million pounds), and Harry Maguire (75 million pounds). So, United must skip the Declan Rice transfer saga.
Even though he didn't buy it at the start of the season, United's interest in Declan Rice was never fervent. Red Devils continue to monitor the British player. United is even said to have prepared a transfer plan for Declan Rice.
